title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: Though Floki Inu (FLOKI) is a dog-themed meme coin, creators see it as "a movement" due to its vision of establishing schools in almost every part of the planet, even in the underdeveloped countries.FLOKI describes itself as a cryptocurrency for people; aiming to make FLOKI the world's most popular and most widely used cryptocurrency.In June 2021, fans and members of the Shiba Inu community created Floki Inu (FLOKI) cryptocurrency.The circulating supply of Floki Inu (FLOKI) is 9317.94 B FLOKI with the maximum supply at 2 Trillion as per CoinMarketCap. FLOKI can be traded on top cryptocurrency exchanges including Deepcoin, BingX, Bybit, MEXC and CoinTiger.Floki Inu (FLOKI) Price Prediction 2022FLOKI price swung from $0.0000063404 to $0.0000178190 within last week after touching the lowest of the month at $0.0000086869. After reversing from the support level, the market is going sideways and is expected to remain bullish for the foreseeable future.In the meantime, we predict a bullish longer-term for Floki Inu (FLOKI) price for 2022 since it won't break the present support level anytime soon. We can expect FLOKI to reach $0.0000207362 in 2022.

After reversing from the support level, the market is going sideways and is expected to remain bullish for the foreseeable future.In the meantime, we predict a bullish longer-term for Floki Inu (FLOKI) price for 2022 since it won't break the present support level anytime soon. We can expect FLOKI to reach $0.0000207362 in 2022.idont know broo meme coin is not trending on the next year so idont know if floki can survive the bear market so if you invest in shitcoin ill suggest invest shiba inu bro its allready listed on a big exchanges like binance coinbase etc . and listed all ready in robbin hood stock exchanges . so for me shib is good to invest for long not floki bro

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Same as above, this token is not a good investment. If I were going to choose among the existing meme coins, I would rather pick the best choice Dogecoin and followed by Shiba Inu.Establishing schools on other planets? Lol ðŸ˜‚ What a fantasy and imagination.We already have the most popular and widely coins and tokens.The exchanges that you have mentioned are not on top.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: It's just a prediction and analysis, right?I will only smile at your efforts to convince many people to enter this coin meme, to be honest, I don't dare to buy a coin meme like Shiba because the supply is so large that it traumatizes me, let alone buying this Floki, in the event of a drastic disposal when a bear market is like this it will make me poor faster so i think a better meme coin is dogecoin and no other doge meme coin i think is good, but keep on trying you guys

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: Why do I feel that this is a copycat of Shiba Inu? Floki Inu has been out there for a while now, and I am really not a fan. It is way too risky investing in such a meme token, especially now that the market is in a pretty bad shape.Maybe in a bull run, It can be considered, but certainly not now.
